member.name: P:csmatio.types.MLSparse.MaxNZ
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of non-zero values.

member.name: P:csmatio.types.MLSparse.IR
member.summary: Gets row indices
member.remarks: IR points to an integer array of length MaxNZ containing the row indices of the correspoding elements in PR and PI

member.name: P:csmatio.types.MLSparse.JC
member.summary: Gets column indices.
member.remarks: JC points to an integer array of length N+1 that contains column index information. For j, in the range of 0<=j<=N-1, JC[j] is the index in the IR and PI (and PI if it exists) of the first nonzero entry in the jth column and JC[j+1]-1 index of the last nonzero entry. As a result, JC[N] is also equal to nnz, the number of nonzero entries in the matrix. If nnz is less than MaxNZ, then more nonzero entries can be inserted in the array without allocating additional storage.
